[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Certified course in” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1595945049983{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading”][vc_custom_heading text=”Digital Marketing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1595945018310{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Topics will be Covered:[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title=”Social Media Marketing” tab_id=”1595943563773-fae38dee-f774″][vc_column_text]Learn below social media tools in a more practical way.

  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter
  • Youtube

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Search Engine Optimization (SEO)” tab_id=”1595943563812-313bfd2c-5eff”][vc_column_text]

  • Why do we need SEO?
  • Understanding On-page SEO
  • Importance of meta tags for SEO
  • What is an SEO Friendly URL?
  • What is the off-page SEO?
  • Techniques for Off-page SEO
  • Social Bookmarking
  • Directory submission etc.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Google AD-Words (SEM) set up and configuration” tab_id=”1595943712613-43cbd0dd-9326″][vc_column_text]

  • Some Tips and Tricks for Ad words

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Google Analytics” tab_id=”1595943753855-1518b172-0e48″][vc_column_text]

  • Live Practical Demo

  • Questions / Answers
